content.detailedDescription: Was taking descending exposures of orion from a tripod using a canon 30d dslr with a 52mm lens, iso 100 white balance set to daylight set to jpg but can provide tiff files of the 5 photos. this took place at about 10:30 pm. the time on the camera was running 12 min faster. you will need to zoom in to see the ufo. its in all of the frames beginning low right and last in upper right.
content.summary: Was taking progressively shorter timed exposures of orion. when i looked at the images the ufo was present.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While walking our normal path, i  left my house about 1:30 with friend.  our walk usually takes about 50 minutes.  we were heading on homebound path near the northend of the lake by the mill.  i noticed in the distance a dark object with about 30 -40 balls hanging below the object.  as the object which mostly hovered began to slowly move toward us the balls moved the same speed with the object.  we stopped a white stansbury park truck and asked the man what it was that we were watching.  he was surprised and said he had no idea.  i took my camera out to enlarge the dark hovering object.  i could not get the object in a frame at all.  i used trees and cloud shapes as references but it would not appear on camera.  we watched it move ever slowly with the balls, but then as it was almost overhead, the cloud line also ended and the balls disappeared.  once the ufo was close and the disc (now it appeared a a disc, changed from black to green, in a pulsating manner and then oddly the color was changing almost digitally, then it changed to blue an then in front of our eyes it simply vanished.  the thought occurred to me that the balls were collecting samples and the object might not have been able to cloak itself with the balls hanging down, but there was no line from the ship to the balls.   they just were and they just hovered and followed the under the ufo never changing position in the sky.  not following but moving at the same speed.  i think it cloaked in the backdrop of the blue sky.  my friend said she thought it was a balloon, but i saw a disruption in the sky around the object.  i knew it was being propelled by something, not simply floating like a balloon.   she also noticed the color change and i didn’t call her on her guess, but i motioned the object to come our way and that scared her. she told me to stop. i was not fearful, more curious, and i am not affected in my religious views either.  i thought it was strange that  commercial plane flew past it, like it wasn’t even there.  but, it was.
content.summary: dark disc with protrusion & balls hanging down in clouds slowly moved toward me then turned from green to blue vanished

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture of chimney rock landmark in western nebraska from the road. looked at the picture when i got home and saw the two football feild size objects in the picture. the sky was hazy from the wyoming forest fires. i didn’t see them when i took the picture
content.summary: Took a picture of chimney rock and captured two stationary football feild size objects. the sky was hazy from the wyoming forest fires so i didn’t see them until i got home and looked again at the picture.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside the house with my camera and in a moment there was light in the sky and i started to record it.
content.summary: Just look at the sky and there's that light and i started to record

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Arrived home and noticed object in the sky at around 730 p.M. it was completely dark. had picked up new contacts earlier in the day. observed what i thought was possibly the planet mars in the nnw direction. dark orange to redish type mars color. object was size of aspirin or so at arms length. light was pulsating like a star. i thought i should look to see where mars location should be. was previously thinking it was a good time to look at stars. watched it for several minutes as it pulsated and changed intensity of light. kirtland air force base is in the opposite direction and i’m used to seeing military flights from kafb and civilian flights from albuquerque sunport. doubtful it was from one of these. looked more like a planet. i went back to driveway for a few seconds & came back and it was just gone. no sign of any lights anywhere in the vicinity of previous encounter. very strange and at a loss for words. not the first thing i’ve seen in albuq. it’s a historical area for these types of sightings.
content.summary: Previously served as fi & asst state director. observed what i thought was possibly the planet mars in the nnw direction.Dark orange to redish type mars color. object size of aspirin or so at arms length. light was pulsating like a star..

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway hoping to catch a glimpse of the dragon rocket which was being launched from cape canaveral. upon searching the blue sky i saw small whitish disc high in the sky. it was very still and made no noise. i thought at first it was the rocket but it didn’t appear to move for nearly five minutes. i have never seen a planet in the morning. i called out to my husband who was in the garage to look at this. i turned my head for a second and when i looked back it was gone.
content.summary: Flat round whitish object stationary i sky

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of my son and the sky. i never saw this with my eyes. it wasnt until i got home and looked at the photos i took that i was shocked to find one photo in particular that clearly shows some sort of disk with a dome flying somewhat lpw to the groumd. i never believed in this stuff prior to taking this photograph and events that have happened since i took the photo have me a little shaken. i don't know what to think anymore honestly.
content.summary: I caught this on camera as i was taking pictures in a golf course near my home. i dis not see it with my eyes. nor dis i hear it. if i had i would have recorded it. upon looking at the photos i took that day i came across this one that has me confused.

content.detailedDescription: On this day 12/15/17  friday at  around 2:00 pm i was playing ball with my dog and just happen to look up at the sky.  what first caught my eye was   passenger jet ,one of many that  crisscross the sky above  daily  from  meachen airport fort worth texas and dfw international airport  and also jets from nearby   lockey martin airport in fort worth . when i first seen the object i thought it was a bird the way it was flying but also thought this is way too high for bird to be flying up there plus i didn’t see any wings.  but as i keep watching it was making moves like a bird but way faster and as it was doing this  i noticed a metallic shine where it was facing the sun .  it’s seem to be very  high in the sky  probably the same attitude the jets flying near by.   after zigzag around sky for a little while it started going south and then i got my iphone and took a picture. i only got one before it darted away south faster then any jet i have ever seen.  i continue playing ball with my dog for about 40  minutes never seeing it again.  the picture will show that it was very high up.  when i zoomed up on the picture that i took it looks like a silver spear ...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: just looking at the sky at about 2:00 pm and seen this strange object in the sky looking north of fort worth texas

content.detailedDescription:
Nuestro bisabuelo fue uno de los ingenieros que contruyeron el telégrafo del presidente roca, así como las líneas y las viviendas y puestos a lo largo de toda su traza.
muchas de estas construcciones ya estaban listas para el año 1900 y por distintas razones se demoraron bastante en ponerlas en marcha em 1905.
todavía tenemos las libretas de campo del bisabuelo, quien por esos años tenía unos 30 años y había llegado a la argentina contratado por el gobierno para esa obra y otras en otros lugares del país.
las casas en lo que él llama la "posta telegráfica mazarredo", que en realidad era una estación telegráfica y no postal, y que mucha gente confundía el nombre y le decía la "casa de los carteros".
¿vieron las películas del viejo oeste de e.U. donde al lado de las vías siempre hay alguien que envía y recibe telegramas?, bueno en mazarredo era igual ya que el telégrafo del pte. roca iba a la par de las vías del ferrocarril.
en las anotaciones del 13/2/1904 el bisabuelo escribe que estaba alojado en la posta mazarredo y que al mediodía estaban preparando el almuerzo cuando sintieron que los perros afuera empezaron a ladras y aullar muy alterados.
entonces uuestro bisabuelo miró por las ventanas que daban en dirección al mar y vió muy cerca de la casa, el escribe como a unos 100 pies, dos pequeñas figuras pequeñas como duendes del alto de un postr de alambrado (algo así como 1 metro).
escribe que estas figuras eran difíciles de ver porque se veían borrosas pero que brillaban con un color celeste muy brilante.
dice que se parecían a personas comunes pero de talla mas pequeña, casi como niños, y que estaban parados ahí muy cerca de la casa y los perros.
nuestro bisabuelo escribe que salió de la casa y fue al encuentro de estas dos figuras pero a medida que se fue acercando a ellas entre los gritos de los perros, éstas se empezaron a alejar en dirección al mar.
escribe que caminaban de una forma extraña como si no supieran hacerlo y que cuando avanzaban parecía como si se estuvieran deslizando sobre el hielo, aclara que no había ni hielo ni nieve y que el sol estaba radiante.
agrega que las figuras hacian un sonido smilar a un chasquido seco.
cuenta además que le costó tranquilizar a los perros junto con la otra gente que vivia en la casa.
termina escribiendo nuestro bisabuelo que estas figuras le hicieron acordar a los relatos de seres fantásticos que su abuelo le contaba cuando era niño de historias de los nativos americanos del oeste de los e.U. y que su padre decía que se parecían mucho a las historias de duendes y hadas de las islas británicas.
dice además que mientras él estaba afuera uno de los encargados de la casa tomó una fotografía desde adentro con una cámara de negativos y que despues le pediría una copia.
no pudimos todavía encontrar esta fotografía porque muchas cosas de la familia no están aquí, pero trataremos de hacerlo.
gracias por permitirnos contar esta historia familiar.
content.summary: Un relato de las libretas del bisabuelo

content.detailedDescription: We got out of the car and we were looking upstairs at our roommate because there is an upstairs entrance and thats when we all noticed it in the sky.We originally thought it was a shooting star but then there were 5 burnt orange lights in a boomerang style.We all knew it wasn't something from here, we all kind of freaked out. completely silent, 5 burnt orange lights in unison, fast moving,2x as fast as a plane typically goes over head (400ft).We all went inside and drew what we saw and it all came out the same and we all agreed without any hesitation. it flew over the house and lost view because we were in the backyard.
content.summary: I am into motor vehicles, this was not a domestic object unless the government has something to do with it.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my group of friends went down to ft.Myers beach to watch the meteor shower. after gazing at the sky for about 15 minutes of seeing shooting stars, i spotted what i thought was a satellite. it was a small red light that appeared almost directly above us, traveling at a constant speed from north to southwest. the object was very far away and made no noise. the object had a constant red/orange glow with no other visible colors. i thought i was the only one who saw it until my friend confirmed that he had seen it too. he was able to see it continue moving south at the same altitude and speed. he also thinks that what we saw was not a plane or a satellite. after about 25 seconds of viewing, the object was too far to see.
content.summary: Constantly fast moving glowing red object. much faster than a plane, but slower than a meteorite. during a meteor shower. not a meteor.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work today, when i saw a massive, cigar-shaped bright-white light hovering over east county san diego. i was driving east on interstate 8, when i saw it. there was not a single cloud in the sky, due to the high pressure that has been present in san diego. 

i lost it as i was driving through mission valley, because the southern mesas were blocking it out. when i drove out of the valley at reached the top of montezuma mesa, it completely vanished from the sky without a trace. i estimate that it was at least a 1/2 mile across in length. 

i saw this same object on october 26th, 2017 from my balcony, moving over the pacific ocean. i reported that sighting along with pictures of it earlier. i also have 2 short videos of it, too.
content.summary: Hovering/cigar-shaped bright light

content.detailedDescription:
At madeira beach, florida, around march 9, 10 or 11 of 2009, 20010 or 2011. it was about 8:15 pm est. it was dusk with a few scattered clouds. i was sitting on our porch overlooking the gulf of mexico. 

from the north i saw 2 glowing orbs, moving southward fairly slowly along the shoreline. my first thought was, "some kid has a really cool remote control toy." the 2 glowing orbs appeared to be a couple of hundred yards apart( 1 appeared to follow the other) and a few hundred yards above the shore. each orb appeared to have a tiny red light near the top. these orbs made absolutely no sound....They were silent. 

as soon as the first orb was past our building it took off upwards and to the south, vanishing almost instantly. immediately the 2nd orb took off upwards and vanished to the north. gone. almost instantly. i had never seen anything like it! 

as i sat there wondering what on earth i had just seen.......Along came either 2 more identical orbs or the same ones. i don't know. 

nevertheless, the same event repeated itself exactly, between 5 and 10 minutes after the first event. everything happened the 2nd time exactly as it had the 1st time. 

other people on the beach or sitting on their balconies must also have seen this happening. 

i put the whole incident out of my mind at the time......Yet periodically i wonder....What did i see? what was that?
content.summary: 2 glowing orbs,1 following the other along shoreline. suddenly 1 vanished up & south the next up &north

content.detailedDescription: As i said this is from facebook but i found it be interesting.
content.summary: I found this post on facebook.  a friend of mine posted it for another friend. i just viewed the pictures in the post

content.detailedDescription: It was another night of capturing data on m42 {orion nebula} started to see objects from my 3rd frame but, it didn't appear in all the frames that were taken even at different exposure times. very strange that the object didn't reveal itself in every frame.
content.summary: I was gathering data , telescope ansd camera was focused .

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out my bedroom window, as i do often, and wrestle with: are we alone?
i saw what seemed to be a star. at first i thought it might have been venus, but it was too large to be venus. then, as if the "people" inside saw me, its big white light turned off. no airplane would be  allowed to do that in mid-flight. what was left was a small red light that went over my house and disappeared from view,behind some apartment behind my house.
the next time i saw it it was moving from east to west. it passed my field of view and as it passed its big white light went out like before.
i have always believed that there were indeed other intelligent and advanced beings out there and this just proved it, for me.
content.summary: Thought it was venus at first

content.detailedDescription: I know people that are not from earth. i know them very well and they can do some pretty cool stuff but i am scared that something bad is happening to me. they have me stuck and they control my life.They are able to read minds and manipulate me.
content.summary: Like i have no control over myself. they can go invisible. i believe they can breathe through there skin

content.detailedDescription:
I must have been 12 or 13 years old.  around 1976.
we lived in sierra vista arizona.
 
the sky was always very clear out there.
a buddy of mine and i were sitting in the back of my dad's truck looking up and toward the west.  a star began to move.
it moved north to south in a straight line, then up to a center point above it's first motion, then back to the original point of origin, making a perfect triangle.
 
as i got older i began to wander if i had just imagined this.  but thirty years later i met my old buddy in tampa one weekend.  as we were reminiscing about our childhood, i asked him if he remembered sitting in my dad's truck one night and before i could finish what i was about to say, he said: " we saw a star make a triangle!"  he went on to say he thinks about it too.
content.summary: A star made a triangular motion.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside about 7 pm to see how cold it was, and while i was outdoor i remembered that a meteor shower was reported on the weather, so decided to let my eyes get accustomed to the dark in hopes to see some meteors. saw a bright moving light, star like, and thought, oh a satellite, as it was at that altitude i normally see a satellite, and i will watch that while i was there. i am very familiar with satellites, have seen and tracked many over the years, and thought gee this one is much brighter than normal of those i usually have seen. object was moving from north to south on a slight angle. it got about ene, just above a pine tree, i used as a reference point, with no tree limbs obstructing my view, and the object stopped dead, hovered for a minute or so, then changed direction 180 degrees to the north. it went a short distance, say about an two inches or so in the sky, a decent distance that i could gauge, and stopped again, reversed again 180 degrees, went about half the distance back the same path to the south, and stopped again. it then did a small circle, say about a 1/2 in in diameter, kind of wiggling as it went in the circle. it then continued on a path to the south and stopped. all the while i was watching i could not believe what i was witnessing, and wished i had my phone. once it stopped, i watched a minute or so, and since it was still, i ran inside to get my phone, my wife asked what was the problem, as i was almost running told her i am watching a ufo and wanted to get my camera. i had took notice of the position, using he pine tree as a maker, it was about 5 degrees above the tree, in a very clear sky. when i got back outside, no more than a minute, it was still in the same location, but perfectly still. it never moved again, while i was watching for the next 5 minutes. wife was probably rolling her eyes, as i pointed it out to her, but it never moved again. after 5 minutes, and since it was about 14 degrees , i went back inside. while i was outside with the camera, i tried to record the object, in the event it moved again, but i was unable see anything on the video. i know what i saw, it moved stopped hovered, circled, changed direction and moved a good distance across the sky.
content.summary: Thought it was a satelite, until i saw it stop, hover, change direction, stop, hover change direction, do a small circle and stop

content.detailedDescription:
Hace un momento leí este texto que al parecer está mal localizado, fue subido como el caso 88782 mufon en panamá, pero corresponde a la patagonia argentina, en la provincia de santa cruz y está relacionado con otros casos de la zona.
por eso me tomo la libertad de volverlo a subir en la localidad más próxima que menciona el texto.
el mismo relata lo siguiente:
"yo vivo en la pequeña localidad de jaramillo que queda sobre la ruta nacional 281, muy cerca de la ruta nacional 3, en la provincia de santa cruz.
me gusta escribir y además acopiar relatos históricos de la región, acá hay muchas historias olvidadas que apenas se conocen y que la explotación minera y petrolera que destruye todo a su paso se encarga de borrar para siempre.
leí el informe de mufon 88710 que habla sobre unas personas y vehículos con un signo extraño en la bahía de mazarredo.
yo vi esos 5 vehículos pasar por jaramillo el día 6/12/17 rumbo al sur ya entrada la tarde, iban todos juntos y muy rápido por la ruta, solo los vi un par de minutos.
también leí el informe de mufon 88754 de alguien que también vio esos vehículos en la localidad de fitz roy que queda a solo 20 km al norte de jaramillo sobre la ruta nacional 3.
debo decir que ese informe está mal incluido en el mapa de mufon porque se colocó donde está el monte fitz roy en la cordillera y no en la localidad que queda sobre la costa.
otro informe de mufon, el 88161, muestra un signo extraño que alguien vio en tres cerros, mucho más al sur de santa cruz.
también hay otros informes en mufon que hablan sobre personas, vehículos y helicópteros, experiencias de personas que cuentan lo que ven y que parecen coincidir en algunos aspectos de sus experiencias.
la verdad es que un helicóptero o un vehículo 4x4 como los que se describen no pasan desapercibidos acá en sur de la patagonia, no solo porque la gente siempre está atenta a todo y nos conocemos todos, sino porque esos vehículos son carísimos y siempre llaman la atención.
pero vamos al tema, en mis notas de escritor y recopilación histórica he visto ese signo en muchas ocasiones, en diferentes vehículos yo diría que por lo menos desde 1980 en adelante y ocasionalmente en algún avión de gran porte.
es coincidente algo, todos son de color blanco y el signo es el mismo y de color naranja tirando al rojo, a veces solo y a veces con alguna otra inscripción alrededor.
había allá por el año 2002 en la ciudad de río gallegos, la capital provincial, unas oficinas que tenían ese signo, no recuerdo bien los nombres en ingles pero sí que eran laboratorios de algo.
también en esa época había en la ciudad de comandante luis piedra buena, otra localidad de la costa patagónica un local con ese signo en una de las esquinas de su vidriera.
no sé si estas existen todavía, aunque las vi personalmente.
algunos comentarios de gendarmes, policías y miembros del ejército dan cuenta de estos vehículos blancos en diferentes lugares de la provincia y la patagonia, también relatos de la armada y prefectura naval cuentan anécdotas, de las que claro, al no ser de primera mano no se tiene seguridad completa sobre su veracidad.
lo que es seguro que en río gallegos hay gente que se ocupa de esta clase de cosas pero llegar a ellos es difícil porque aunque contesten los correos siempre conservan la distancia de una forma muy educada.
me gustaría hacer una breve recopilación de la zona que tal vez aporte alguna claridad y que se podría sumar a los informes de mufon, todo lo que suma es bueno aunque tal vez nunca nadie los estudie en conjunto.
el 21/10/17 a la noche se vieron una luces cerca de la costa de comodoro rivadavia de color azul muy intenso que subían y bajaban, luego se metieron en las aguas iluminando el mar desde abajo.
el 24/10/17 pescadores de un pequero de altura que recaló por averías en puerto deseado contaron sobre un encuentro en alta mar con un helicóptero blanco, enorme y volando muy bajo en un mar agitado.
el 27/10/17 un matrimonio que se encontraba de viaje por la ruta nacional 3 saliendo de caleta olivia en el paraje la lobería dijo haber visto cruzar la ruta a una figura casi transparente que parecía un fantasma, a tan solo 30 metros de ellos.
el 30/10/17 un transportista petrolero fue seguido varios kilómetros por una luz de color rojo intenso en la ruta provincial 12.
el 7/11/17 una pareja de adolescentes vieron un objeto parecido a una esfera salir del mar en horas de la madrugada en el paraje punta chaffers al norte de puerto deseado.
el 11/11/17 un fotógrafo que trabajaba para una minera vio un vehículo y 3 personas extrañas a la vera de la ruta provincial 47, al preguntarle si necesitaban algo uno de ellos le contestó con un sonido grave y resonante.
el 14/11/17 un grupo de turistas que estaban explorando las nacientes del río deseado a unos 60 km del mar, mientras preparaban su campamento fueron interrumpidos por un sonido como de una trompeta que no supieron muy bien de donde provenía, más tarde esa noche mientras estaban reunidos frente a una fogata vieron cerca en la noche una silueta de la que solo se veía su contorno pálidamente iluminado.
el 23/11/17 un grupo de trabajadores rurales vieron en el paraje laguna verde 2 objetos sobrevolar el lugar en grandes círculos para luego descender a varios kilómetros.
y el 27/11/17 un policía de guardia en la policía caminera del paso interprovincial ramón santos relató cómo vio aproximarse por el camino y a gran velocidad a 2 vehículos blancos y desaparecer ente sus ojos antes de llegar al lugar donde estaba.
estas y muchas otras historias son muy comunes en la región, pero tal vez uno de los relatos mas estremecedores es uno del año 1921 escrito por un teniente de ejército en su libreta de campo, el cuenta "estábamos entrado por el sudeste al cañadón de las vacas donde sabíamos que habían apostados un pequeño grupo de huelguistas, hicimos una posta para esperar que bajo el sol cuando nos interrumpió el camino un hombre alto, delgado y que vestía unas ropas que parecían estar iluminadas desde adentro, nos dijo que era médico y que en ese lugar había una peste, que debíamos regresar por donde habíamos venido, nadie se atrevió a contradecirlo pues era una bendición salir de ese desierto de pastizales espinosos y secos, eso hicimos, ninguno de la batida pudo comer su rancho esa noche, todos estábamos descompuestos y lo seguimos estando por varios días incluso cuando fuimos destacados de vuelta a rivadavia".
la gente de la patagonia es mas bien introvertida y pocos cuentan sus historias y vivencias, pero la verdad es que la patagonia siempre tuvo ese sabor misterioso y enigmático, a veces bello y a veces grotesco, tal vez sea esa una de las cosas que nos haga quedarnos tan lejos de las grandes ciudades.".
content.summary: Algunos misterios en la costa patagónica

lo que es seguro que en río gallegos hay gente que se ocupa de esta clase de cosas pero llegar a ellos es difícil porque aunque contesten los correos siempre conservan la distancia de una forma muy educada.
me gustaría hacer una breve recopilación de la zona que tal vez aporte alguna claridad y que se podría sumar a los informes de mufon, todo lo que suma es bueno aunque tal vez nunca nadie los estudie en conjunto.
el 21/10/17 a la noche se vieron una luces cerca de la costa de comodoro rivadavia de color azul muy intenso que subían y bajaban, luego se metieron en las aguas iluminando el mar desde abajo.
el 24/10/17 pescadores de un pequero de altura que recaló por averías en puerto deseado contaron sobre un encuentro en alta mar con un helicóptero blanco, enorme y volando muy bajo en un mar agitado.
el 27/10/17 un matrimonio que se encontraba de viaje por la ruta nacional 3 saliendo de caleta olivia en el paraje la lobería dijo haber visto cruzar la ruta a una figura casi transparente que parecía un fantasma, a tan solo 30 metros de ellos.
el 30/10/17 un transportista petrolero fue seguido varios kilómetros por una luz de color rojo intenso en la ruta provincial 12.
el 7/11/17 una pareja de adolescentes vieron un objeto parecido a una esfera salir del mar en horas de la madrugada en el paraje punta chaffers al norte de puerto deseado.
el 11/11/17 un fotógrafo que trabajaba para una minera vio un vehículo y 3 personas extrañas a la vera de la ruta provincial 47, al preguntarle si necesitaban algo uno de ellos le contestó con un sonido grave y resonante.
el 14/11/17 un grupo de turistas que estaban explorando las nacientes del río deseado a unos 60 km del mar, mientras preparaban su campamento fueron interrumpidos por un sonido como de una trompeta que no supieron muy bien de donde provenía, más tarde esa noche mientras estaban reunidos frente a una fogata vieron cerca en la noche una silueta de la que solo se veía su contorno pálidamente iluminado.
el 23/11/17 un grupo de trabajadores rurales vieron en el paraje laguna verde 2 objetos sobrevolar el lugar en grandes círculos para luego descender a varios kilómetros.
y el 27/11/17 un policía de guardia en la policía caminera del paso interprovincial ramón santos relató cómo vio aproximarse por el camino y a gran velocidad a 2 vehículos blancos y desaparecer ente sus ojos antes de llegar al lugar donde estaba.
estas y muchas otras historias son muy comunes en la región, pero tal vez uno de los relatos mas estremecedores es uno del año 1921 escrito por un teniente de ejército en su libreta de campo, el cuenta "estábamos entrado por el sudeste al cañadón de las vacas donde sabíamos que habían apostados un pequeño grupo de huelguistas, hicimos una posta para esperar que bajo el sol cuando nos interrumpió el camino un hombre alto, delgado y que vestía unas ropas que parecían estar iluminadas desde adentro, nos dijo que era médico y que en ese lugar había una peste, que debíamos regresar por donde habíamos venido, nadie se atrevió a contradecirlo pues era una bendición salir de ese desierto de pastizales espinosos y secos, eso hicimos, ninguno de la batida pudo comer su rancho esa noche, todos estábamos descompuestos y lo seguimos estando por varios días incluso cuando fuimos destacados de vuelta a rivadavia".
la gente de la patagonia es mas bien introvertida y pocos cuentan sus historias y vivencias, pero la verdad es que la patagonia siempre tuvo ese sabor misterioso y enigmático, a veces bello y a veces grotesco, tal vez sea esa una de las cosas que nos haga quedarnos tan lejos de las grandes ciudades.
content.summary: Algunos misterios en la costa patagónica

content.detailedDescription: Gsored lights
content.summary: Red li

content.detailedDescription:
Thursday, december 14, 2017
time 4:58 pm
northwest of the 7th st walmart in joplin, mo. i recorded a short video clip of 1 of 2 ufo's. witnessed also by my husband. i had been recording the sky all throughout the day in various locations in joplin. so while walking out of walmart we were looking & talking about how strange the skies are becoming while loading our groceries & getting into our vehicle. when a bright white orb that looked like it was made out of energy or white light came into view right where i was looking. they seemed to emit more from below which you can see in the video. it came out of nowhere & then another one appeared above it. then the one on top moved to the right of the first one in a motion that was almost instantaneous but not. it did not swerve or move off into another direction other than what i state here. they both pulsed with a bright white light which was more obvious right before the 2nd one moved. then they both pulsed & the second one was gone. i was pushing the button to record right after the 2nd one disappeared but the 1st one stayed put. you can hear on the video that i thought i lost it while aiming the camera. you can also hear the sadness in my voice. my husband thought it moved at one point but he hadn't stopped watching it. but it was just dimming. it is important to note that my husband never turned away so that we could accurately pinpoint any movement in case my phone caused me to lose focus because we just barely missed the photo/video opportunity in almost the exact same location on another occasion. last time we were just a parking lot (half block) away from this location. that was also reported to mufon shortly after. this time i made backups & gave them to other people before reporting as an added measure to not lose data. then the remaining one pulsed & was gone. the light pole from the parking lot obviously shows the distance & that it did not move when i moved the camera. also you can tell i thought it had disappeared which is why i stopped the recording but it actually ended afterward. i was excited & was trying to find it through a lens which is what happens when you are looking at a vast space through a small hole but we both saw it leave. it was really amazing. very pretty & was not like our other sighting in this area. last time (1-25-2017) that one was silver & had a different shape etc. this was more crystal teardrop shaped if i had to assign it a shape, with the bright light energy affect & was beautiful & awe like, not "craft like" for lack of a better analogy. it should be noted that the sun was setting & it was a sea of oranges, pinks, purples etc but not near them. an airplane was flying near enough to see it from the airplane going northeast. i remember it because i was counting planes which normally have chemtrails. this one did not.
content.summary: Saw 2 energy emitting ufo's almost a diamond shape emitting bright white light

content.detailedDescription: Meditating in a house next to a church then i had certain visuals come thru of greys talking to me talking about my blood and dna. i first noticed tapping on the glass of the window my ex husband and i both went outside that is when the been been appeared on the lds church. i atomatically knew it was other beings because i had been receiving mental telecanises like messages. i remember hearing in the feild behind the barn almost like radio static all around. i was very excited to have this going on until i stared seeing shadows and other interactions in the home i remember glowing blue faces appeared right outside the bedroom. i felt as though i was directed to go onto hafb. i for some reason threw my keys in the trash can i was next to the flight command center it was a sunday. i brought my dog with me thru the building. later base police called my family because a family member happens to work there on base to come get me and the animal. i was taken to the hospital, i was trying to describe to them along the way of coarse it didn't make sense to them. i was hospitalized for 9 days on meds when i came more aware of my surroundings on day 6 a very tall close to grey looking entity, came into my hospital room. when i got up to walk towards it or her as it felt it vanished. after the hospital i did see a very large ship about 4 or 5 houses long appear in the clouds and disappear as i got closer. the doctor tried to diagnose me with skitzophrania then told me no i don't think it's that i think it's something else. i was just barely finishing my 6 of 8 yr contract with the military. p.S. while i was on dugway proving grounds i did see orange light balls in the distance during a training moving very far and fast from left to right as well as shooting staight up and slowly coming back down months prior to the event. do to the times of the sitting s i was not able to capture any photos or videos. there are more details but these are the best key points i could get across. i have a book that i wrote during the event but i'm unsure that it will help.
content.summary: Beam bright green on top of lds church saw entity in the hospital a few days later apox. 1 week of interaction

content.detailedDescription:
I believe i already sent this sighting in, however, i unfortunately cannot find any evidence of this record being sent off.

i was initially skeptical of ufos until i saw this. 

i took some video on my phone, but the quality is terrible.

however, after watching various mufon videos, my boyfriend and i are convinced we saw the same thing/something similar.  

it was on the northern tip of cape breton--no land anywhere around but a sparsely populat s island miles off shore. the duration of the viewing was over an hour and a half--and is also how we decided it was not and airplane, satellite, lantern, drone, etc. 

i have attached th videos, though the orb is doing difficult to detect you can spot it!
content.summary: Brightest light in sky, by far. moved erratically, blinked and lasted over 1 hour.

content.summary: Do not speek english

content.detailedDescription: I was at glen o jones campground. i was having a weekend camp out. it was around 3 am or so and i was asleep in my tent . suddenly a big group of extremely bright and colorful lights were casted right through my tent.  and because it was so bright i woke up and thought to myself "what the heck is that ???"i quickly got out of my tent and went down by the lake to see what i could see. i walked down to the lake expecting to see something ordinary like an airplane or helicopter or maybe a blimp etc. however when i looked up in the sky what i saw put me in shock . i was frozen right where i was standing just gazing up at this bizarre sphere looking aircraft.  it was the kind of staring like a deer in headlights.  i couldn't even begin to fathom it.  first thing i thought was "there is no way that this could be a ufo could it???"it was huge i would say probably the size of a football field at least. it had a dome shaped top and had idk how many windows. it was casting down a bright beam of light right from underneath it.  it has these red lights that sort of pulsated and flashed almost like every ten seconds. it was hovering still just barely above the tree lines on the south side of the lake.  after many of minutes of staring basically traumatized ; i decided to slowly get my phone out and snap a picture before it disappeared.  and i also thought to myself it would be great to have solid proof . so i got my phone out and began to snap a picture but when i did this thing sped off into the sky . i mean it was gone before i could blink an eye.  and it was very bizarre how it managed to disappear so quickly without making a sound.  well after trying to capture a picture . i looked at the photo i had taken just hoping i had maybe caught the tail end of this thing and there was nothing . the picture was just a blur.  another thing that baffled me about it was why did this thing instantly vanish when i held my phone up to get a picture. coincidental? ? or maybe who/whatever was flying this thing knew what i was trying to do?? it was like the operator of this aircraft knew i was trying to get proof of my discovery. well after this thing took off . i was too in shock and frightened to stay for the rest of the night so i packed up and left in a hurry.  i went home and told my family and friends about my experience and of course they laughed in my face.  asking me if i was drunk or on something . however i went out to the lake during the day and spoke to a few normal campers in that area and told them about what i saw and tried to describe it without coming out and saying precisely "ufo ".But each one of them said "it was probably a ufo . we've seen a few of them out here on many occasions. anyways , that's my experience . i have told many of people about it and they all just laughed and didn't believe me.  but, i know what i saw and i'll take it to my grave.
content.summary: Something lit up my tent like the fourth of july when i was camping. i ran down by the lake and it was like i was frozen in fear.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and could see it outside my kitchen window.  it looked like a large star at first but more brilliant than usual.  after looking through binoculars the shape was more defined like an oval and sometimes appeared to have television like stripes on the surface.  it changed in color from blue to green to violet and bright red or orange.  it appeared to pulsate or move rapidly because even when i took pictures with a very fast shutter speed the object was never truly round.  it was out there for a while, i just eventually went to bed.
content.summary: Disc like oval luminary that kept changing colors and pulsating

content.detailedDescription:
I set out a nikon p900 camera looking at the sky hoping to catch geminid startrails , using the timelapse functions of the camera,on, 12/13/2017 and this video is the result of observed lights appearing and stationary.
the cam was facing about 75 degrees up from the east horizon, at my home in san antonio,tx,78220. i set it at approx, 3:30am and went to sleep.
there are ligts standing still in the video in the left top and bottom , that just appeared, with two lines, as the atartrails are moving,
to me, unexplainable.  the startrails moved but not the lights that mysteriously appeared on the left. hmmm...I noticed the lights after seeing the video, i took,...I am bewildered.
this is a video video clip available for your authentication and inspection anytime.
content.summary: Light s in the shapes of two triangles with one extended light

content.detailedDescription:
81st and mingo in tulsa oklahoma
 while driving west with my wife
we noticed a beautiful sunset 
against a sky of clouds. 
shortly after we noticed a large
perfect oval in the clouds it was even casting a shadow
content.summary: It was a perfect oval in the clouds, like it was invisible.
